message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be incredibly beneficial for you.  I'm asking for $13,000 to start negotiations.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,500 is significantly below its true value.  This product delivers exceptional results and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.  How about we meet halfway at $11,250?
I understand that the product has great value, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so how about we try $10,000?
